org.deeplearning4j.spark.earlystopping

Class SparkDataSetLossCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.spark.earlystopping.SparkDataSetLossCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ScoreCalculator

    public class SparkDataSetLossCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScoreCalculator
    Given a DataSetIterator: calculate the total loss for the model on that data set, using Spark. Typically used to calculate the loss on a test set.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Calculate the score (loss function value) on a given data set (usually a test set)

      • SparkDataSetLossCalculator

        public SparkDataSetLossCalculator(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<DataSet> data,
                          boolean average,
                          org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext sc)
        Calculate the score (loss function value) on a given data set (usually a test set)
        Parameters:
        data - Data set to calculate the score for
        average - Whether to return the average (sum of loss / N) or just (sum of loss)
